verses.name: 1 Samuel 26:20
verses.text: Now therefore, let not my blood fall to the earth before the face of the Lord: for the king of Israel is come out to seek a flea, as when one doth hunt a partridge in the mountains.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 26:21
verses.text: Then said Saul, I have sinned: return, my son David: for I will no more do thee harm, because my soul was precious in thine eyes this day: behold, I have played the fool, and have erred exceedingly.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 26:22
verses.text: And David answered and said, Behold the king’s spear! and let one of the young men come over and fetch it.
